Q.NO 1 What is the Main working of this Application? 
 Ans: Basically this Application is used to ease the problem to subscribe packages. 
 
 Q.no 2 What is the main working of this application? 
 Ans: With this application you can subscribe to all packages of all sims with just one click. 
 
 Q.no 3 There are many applications already working same thing! 
 Ans: No, actually for each carrier you will have to download each application, such as for Jazz "Jazz World App" 
 
 Q.no 4 Why do i choose this app over existing apps? 
 Ans: Basically this is offline application, all other applications do require internet access to work, but this application work without internet you whenever you dont have internet access you can still use this application.
 
 Q.no 5 Which Carrier this application support and which packages? 
 Ans: As This application support Jazz/Warid, Zong, Telenor and Ufone as well
